fields.name: 1.5m barrel sauna
fields.description: Barrel sauna, fully assembled. Full size outside: 1,5m length and 2.20m diameter. Inside: 1.21m length and 2.11m diameter. This sauna is equipped with wooden door with a glass, seats (2), stove, LED lights, floor, light switches.
